text:
If you want to manually change something(not via settings/website/design/your-design) in your theme you have to clone it if it is a) provided by HubSpot(@HubSpot folder) or b) from the marketplace. 

If you're a developer you can change default values in the field.json(can be found on the root level of the theme) of every theme. 
If you're not a developer you should do it via settings/website/design/your-design. 
Note: of you clone a theme it will have the same name as the original one. To change that simply open the theme.json file of your cloned theme and change the value(right side) of the "label"(should be in line 2)..
